name: Transform Master
description:
Nothing can stand in your way! In Transform Master, you are the master of the game, and it’s time to show your enemies who’s boss!

Tackle the levels, avoid the obstacles, and use objects to get those enemies out of your way. Race to the finish line and destroy all that stands in your path. In Transform Master, you have one goal—to win!

Download Transform Master, and let’s start this epic adventure.
